title: Council Decision of 4 June 2009 appointing one UK alternate member of the Committee of the Regions
header:
11.6.2009 EN Official Journal of the European Union C 132/3
COUNCIL DECISION
of 4 June 2009
appointing one UK alternate member of the Committee of the Regions
2009/C 132/03
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community, and in particular Article 263 thereof,
Having regard to the proposal of the Government of the United Kingdom,
Whereas:
(1) On 24 January 2006, the Council adopted Decision 2006/116/EC appointing the members and alternate members of the Committee of the Regions for the period from 26 January 2006 to 25 January 2010 (1).
(2) An alternate member's seat on the Committee of the Regions has become vacant following the appointment of Mr Robert BRIGHT as a member of the Committee of the Regions,
main_body:
The following is hereby appointed to the Committee of the Regions as an alternate member for the remainder of the current term of office, which runs until 25 January 2010:
Mr Chris HOLLEY, Councillor for City and Council of Swansea, Wales.
This Decision shall take effect on the day of its adoption.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 4 June 2009.
For the Council
The President
Martin PECINA
(1)  OJ L 56, 25.2.2006, p. 75.
